❤ Arch Hosting ❤ VPS From $5/m ★ 24/7 Support ★ 1 Gbps ★ 99.99% SLA ★ USA ★

Arch Hosting - https://archhosting.net

Arch Hosting is proud to offer high quality VPS hosting at affordable prices. We aim to provide the same premium quality of service that we have succeeded in providing our shared hosting customers for over two years. Our VPS service was created with three core goals in mind: speed, reliability, and affordability. The end result an extremely powerful platform at a very low cost to the consumer - you.

Our infrastructure consists of reliable dedicated servers colocated with CentriLogic for our eastern US locations and QuadraNet for our western US locations. These datacenters are reputable for their quality networking and impeccable uptime. We’re constantly growing and have a plethora of features and developments we’re planning to roll out, all at no extra cost for existing clients. We currently have a very limited stock, so don’t delay!

Why Arch Hosting?
24/7/365 Premium Support - Standing by to take your questions!
7 Day Money Back Guarantee
99.99% Uptime Guarantee (& SLA)
1 Gbps dedicated network with premium tier providers (No Cogent!)
Legal United States entity & Owned IP Space
4 years of business - We know what we’re doing!
Full IPv6 adoption on all servers

What’s so special about your KVM plans?
New location and servers! Use the promo code ‘SPRING’ for 10% off your order!
Pure, brand new Samsung 850 Pro SSDs
3 Gbps of real layer 4 DDoS protection
Los Angeles datacenter, great pings to North America and Asia!
